author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING MELISSA...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING MELISSA... As of 2:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -74.0 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING MELISSA... As of 2:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -74.0 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
